name: A ROPY BATTLE
description:
This is a submission to the 2021 GMTK jam. The theme was: "Joined Together"

The game is featting for the theme because the 2 players are joined together.

In the game you can play localy with a friend or play against the computer.

The goal is to survive more time then your enemy for 10 times before he does.

*Controls:

Escape = Pause and unpause

Player 1 (Blue, who you play with against the computer):

-W = move up

-S = move down

-A = move left

-D = move right

Player 2 (Red, the computer in 1 player):

-Each of the arrow keys corresponds to the direction in its name

*Game Play

In the game you are connected to the other player so your movement will affect his and the other way around.

Some floor tiles will fall (avoid them) and they'll warn you by shaking before they fall.

Bullets will show up (avoid them too) before they spawn an exclimation mark (!) will show where they'll spawn.

If you fall into a pit or touch a bullet the game will restart and the other player will get a point, first to reach 10 wins!

Credit to my friend who made the music for the game.
